name: ReReReSpawn
description:
HTML5 (web) and Windows standalone

Alarm! The enemy horde is here! There are too many for you to defeat all alone…

…but whenever you die, you respawn alongside your former lives. Can you defeat the horde and break the endless cycle?

Controls

Move left : A or Left Arrow Move right : D or Right Arrow Jump : W or Up Arrow or Space Aim : Mouse Cursor Shoot : Hold Left Mouse Button Pause : Ctrl (or Esc when not in full screen)

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/rererespawn

Uses the A* Pathfinding Project (Aron Granberg)
